movie.title: 7 Days in Entebbe
movie.plot: Inspired by the true events of the 1976 hijacking of an Air France flight en route from Tel Aviv to Paris, and the most daring rescue mission ever attempted.

events.title: 102 hostages are freed in Operation Thunderbolt at Entebbe airport
